entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
